sentences.en: a radical approach to education
sentences.cn: 有创见的教育方法

sentences.en: a radical reform of the tax system
sentences.cn: 税收制度的彻底改革

sentences.en: He has put forward some very radical ideas .
sentences.cn: 他提出了一些非常激进的观点。

sentences.en: He remained for some years avowedly radical in his political outlook.
sentences.cn: 他多年来保持公然激进的政治观。

sentences.en: He was regularly pilloried by the press for his radical ideas.
sentences.cn: 他因观点极端而经常受到新闻界的抨击。

sentences.en: He's trying to bring together various strands of radical philosophic thought.
sentences.cn: 他正试图把各种激进的哲学思想综合在一起。

sentences.en: His opinions are very radical.
sentences.cn: 他的观点很激进.

sentences.en: I belong to the school of thought that favors radical change.
sentences.cn: 我属于激进派.

sentences.en: I was shocked by her radical views.
sentences.cn: 她的激进观点让我震惊。

sentences.en: If he presents himself as a radical he risks scaring off the moderates.
sentences.cn: 如果他表现得过于激进，就有可能吓跑温和派人士。

sentences.en: Increasingly, their goals have become more radical.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标变得越来越激进。

sentences.en: Radical eye surgery promises to cure short-sightedness.
sentences.cn: 彻底的眼部手术有望治愈近视。

sentences.en: Radical feminism is currently the fashionable topic among the chattering classes.
sentences.cn: 激进的女权主义是时下名嘴阶层热议的话题。

sentences.en: radicals on the extreme left wing of the party
sentences.cn: 党内极左翼激进分子

sentences.en: She is radical in her demands.
sentences.cn: 她的要求十分偏激

sentences.en: Such a radical proposal would never get through parliament.
sentences.cn: 如此激进的提案永远不会得到议会的批准。

sentences.en: The choreography of Eric Hawkins is considered radical by ballet audiences.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞观众认为埃里克·霍金斯的舞蹈设计非常前卫。

sentences.en: the need for radical changes in education
sentences.cn: 对教育进行彻底变革的需要

sentences.en: The patient got a radical cure in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 病人在医院得到了根治.

sentences.en: The professor's a radical in politics but a conservative dresser.
sentences.cn: 教授在政治上是激进派,但衣着却很守旧.

sentences.en: the radical wing of the party
sentences.cn: 党内的激进派

sentences.en: There are radical differences between the two organizations.
sentences.cn: 这两个组织有着根本差异。

sentences.en: There will be a radical swing to the right or the left.
sentences.cn: 这样将出现极左或极右的情况。

sentences.en: They are proposing radical changes to the way the company is run.
sentences.cn: 他们建议对公司经营模式进行重大改革。

sentences.en: What then, is the interest of such an analysis, from a radical left point of view?
sentences.cn: 那么，这种关于利益论的分析，是从一个激进的左倾的观点推导出来的吗？

trans.tran_cn: 根本的，基本的，激进的，彻底的，[植]根生的
trans.tran_en: a radical change or difference is very big and important

trans.tran_cn: 根本的，基本的；激进的，激进派的
激进分子，根基，原子团，[数学]根数
trans.tran_en: someone who has new and different ideas, especially someone who wants complete social and political change
